testcase.name: testBcryptDecryptShouldSupportLegacyKeyDerivationProcess
testcase.system-err: [main] INFO org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.PasswordBasedEncryptorGroovyTest - Plaintext: This is a plaintext message. [main] INFO org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.PasswordBasedEncryptorGroovyTest - [TEST] Using fixed Bcrypt salt: $2a$12$C4.OumROu.h.A3xwH0d/.. The value can be obtained in the calling code by invoking 'cipher.getIV()'; [main] INFO org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.PasswordBasedEncryptorGroovyTest - Cipher text (91): 243261243132246339467a6b4674762e4d786c36624a5736587246652e4e69466953414c54c779dd03a6061bb2ac02c02cff038ea74e69466949568ad8028e066bff847fba078b3c3fbec76db2e52fd8b57f641db3817505b9b1e1 [main] DEBUG org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.BcryptSecureHasher - Creating Bcrypt hash with salt [7bf1f5987bf100ece7f1d2d8f19b4780] (16 bytes) [main] DEBUG org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.BcryptSecureHasher - Generated Bcrypt hash in 283 ms [main] WARN org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.PasswordBasedEncryptor - Error decrypting content using Bcrypt-derived key; attempting legacy key derivation for backward compatibility [main] DEBUG org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.BcryptSecureHasher - Creating Bcrypt hash with salt [7bf1f5987bf100ece7f1d2d8f19b4780] (16 bytes) [main] DEBUG org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.BcryptSecureHasher - Generated Bcrypt hash in 282 ms [main] WARN org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.KeyDerivationBcryptSecureHasher - Using Legacy Key Derivation on bcrypt hash including cost and salt [main] INFO org.apache.nifi.security.util.crypto.PasswordBasedEncryptorGroovyTest - Plaintext (29): This is a plaintext message.

testcase.name: testScryptSaltShouldBe16Bytes
